chunks.text: Today is Saturday, May 31st, 2025.  Welcome to the AI Rundown, where we don't do deep dives.  We jus...
My name is Phil, and let's start exploring.
This week we're covering Anthropic's Claude getting a voice, OpenAI's ambitious plans for ambient co...
I'm joined today by Susan, our resident skeptic who keeps us grounded in reality, and John, our tech...
Let's kick things off with the biggest story this week.  Anthropic just launched voice mode for Clau...
Not at all, Phil.  What makes Claude's voice mode interesting is the Google Workspace integration.
You can actually have Claude audibly tell you about your calendar, read your emails, and access your...
It's powered by their Claude Sonnet 4 model and uses ElevenLabs for text-to-speech generation.
Hold on though - we're talking about giving an AI assistant access to our most sensitive personal an...
What happens when there's a security breach or the AI starts hallucinating about our private informa...
That's a fair concern, Susan.  John, what are the usage limits looking like for this rollout?
Free users get about 20 to 30 voice messages per day, while paid subscribers get significantly highe...
The feature is rolling out in English only for now across iOS and Android apps.
What's technically interesting is how smoothly you can switch between text and voice input during a ...
And let me guess - this is just the beginning of Anthropic trying to catch up to ChatGPT's voice fea...
